list.name: repo_id
list.label: Repo
list.query: SELECT repo AS __text, repo AS __value FROM repos ORDER BY repo

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.commits_count, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.prs_merged, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, concat(r.repo, ' p50') AS metric, argMax(m.median_pr_cycle_hours, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, concat(r.repo, ' p90') AS metric, argMax(m.pr_cycle_p90_hours, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

panels.title: Large Change Ratios
panels.description: Large commits are computed from commit LOC; large PRs require PR size facts (optional).

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, concat(r.repo, ' large commit ratio') AS metric, argMax(m.large_commit_ratio, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, concat(r.repo, ' large PR ratio') AS metric, argMax(m.large_pr_ratio, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

panels.title: MTTR (DORA) — hours
panels.description: Mean Time To Recovery. Time from first revert commit/PR to subsequent successful merge.

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.mttr_hours, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

panels.title: Change Failure Rate (DORA)
panels.description: Percentage of merged PRs that are reverts.

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.change_failure_rate, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

panels.title: PR Rework Ratio
panels.description: Percentage of merged PRs that had CHANGES_REQUESTED before merging.

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.pr_rework_ratio, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day
